trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Kenosha
There were no other sightings in Kenosha on or around June 22nd 2001
divs: sighting detailswas returning to kenosha with a freind on a county road traveling east, i noticed a light shining on a cloud, it remided me of a pizza driver looking for an address. told my freind to stop and he pulled over. i saw the light stop and what i thought was a helocopter come down between 2 clouds. was a bright moon that night an i could make out the cloud shape. i was decending towards us , i would guess at about 45 degrees up coming down slow. it had 5 total lights on the front of it. reminded me of the old round head lights on the 50's and 60's cars and truck. three light in a row and then 2 lights under the top three, spaced evenly. we got out of the car and it got closer to us and my freind got scared and went back to the car. i got really nervous and thought he was going to leave me there so, i ran back and got in the car and looked out the windshield. it got around 2 light poles away from us and i could make out a window above the lights because there was a soft light inside, it turned to our left and was moving very slow like a air balloon. when it turned i could see the bottom real clear, had an round\oval shape ,longer than wider, it had what looked like plexiglass panels with a stop sign like shape in the center bottom, some were blueish and some were purpleish and they changed in brightness but, nothing in time , just randomly. in the back lower of it i saw a light come out on each side but, not at the same time. reminded me of a flame on a gas stove and had the shape of a flashlight beam. i couldn't hear anything and had the windows down. it wasn't very high over the wires and in the middle of its left turn i stared at the window, i could make out a figure that looked human, i could see a shadow from the waist up, looked like he\she was standing looking out to the front were the lights were shinning. i floated to our left until we lost it in the trees. to me it moved like a ballon with control. we talked about it and decided that it must be from great lakes of another goverment place. but, i never sen anything like that again and wanted to report it before i forget a lot of the details. it happenend a little over ten years ago and the memory still bothers me.
Summary: saw lights on cloud and stooped to see craft come down and turn left with no noise and only 2 light poles away and 20 feet over lines.
